Package components.players

Class Player

java.lang.Object
components.players.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
AIPlayer, DumbComputerPlayer, HumanPlayer
public abstract class Player extends Object
The Player class represents an abstract player in a card game. It provides common functionality and methods that are expected for a player participating in the UNO card game.
